data.feedback: Well-architected Docker configuration for Flutter web. Uses correct Flutter image (cirruslabs, not deprecated flutter/flutter), proper multi-stage build, nginx SPA routing with try_files fallback, and comprehensive .dockerignore. Technical guidance is detailed with patterns, anti-patterns, and verification commands.

issues.description: web/index.html listed in filesToRead but doesn't exist
issues.recommendation: Remove from filesToRead or note it's auto-generated during flutter build web

suggestions: Consider adding ENABLE_CRASH_REPORTING and ENABLE_VERBOSE_LOGGING to build args for completeness with .env.example
Could add ARG FLUTTER_VERSION to make SDK version configurable
